product_name: The North Face Warm Long Underwear Tights - Men's
long_description: Stay comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather with the men's The North Face Warm long underwear tights. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams which are designed to enhance motion. Functional fly. The North Face Warm long underwear tights offer a relaxed fit that skims the body.
short_description: Stay comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather with the men's The North Face Warm long underwear tights.
